mapper.select: SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_ANSWER , Q_ENROLL_DATE , Q_MODIFY_DATE , F.QC_NO , QC_NAME , USER_NO FROM FAQ F, Q_CATEGORY Q WHERE F.QC_NO = Q.QC_NO
SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_ANSWER , Q_ENROLL_DATE , Q_MODIFY_DATE , f.QC_NO , QC_NAME , USER_NO FROM FAQ F, Q_CATEGORY Q WHERE F.QC_NO = Q.QC_NO AND Q.qc_no = #{categoryCode}

SELECT Q_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_ANSWER , Q_ENROLL_DATE , Q_MODIFY_DATE , Q.QC_NO , QC_NAME , USER_NO FROM FAQ Q, Q_CATEGORY C WHERE Q_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR Q_ANSWER LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
